sn46.51:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you what fuels and what starves the five hindrances and the seven awakening factors.
sn46.51:1.4: And what fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:1.5: There is the feature of beauty.
sn46.51:1.7: fuels the arising of sensual desire, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:2.1: And what fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:2.2: There is the feature of harshness.
sn46.51:2.4: fuels the arising of ill will, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:3.1: And what fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:3.2: There is discontent, sloth, yawning, sleepiness after eating, and mental sluggishness.
sn46.51:3.4: fuels the arising of dullness and drowsiness, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow.
sn46.51:4.1: And what fuels the arising of restlessness and remorse, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?

sn46.51:5.1: And what fuels the arising of doubt, or, when it has arisen, makes it increase and grow?
sn46.51:5.2: There are things that are grounds for doubt.

sn46.51:6.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?
sn46.51:6.2: There are things that are grounds for the awakening factor of mindfulness.
sn46.51:6.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of mindfulness, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.
sn46.51:7.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?
sn46.51:7.2: There are qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright.
sn46.51:7.4: fuels the arising of the awakening factor of investigation of principles, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it.
sn46.51:8.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of energy, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?
sn46.51:8.2: There are the elements of initiative, persistence, and exertion.

sn46.51:9.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of rapture, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?

sn46.51:10.1: And what fuels the arising of the awakening factor of tranquility, or, when it has arisen, fully develops it?
